question.name: study003_comparison
question.summary: Find genes EPO phosphorylation PTM targets in UT-7epo-E cells.
question.description:
Find EPO phosphorylation PTM targets in UT-7epo-E cells.

These data come from the %%study005_name%% study.

First choose an experiment and a treatment to be compared against untreate control cells.

Then choose the directionality and the magnitude of the (log2) fold difference.

columnAttribute.name: reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 intensity for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 intensity for the alternate, comparison condition
